title: mOhana rUpam
sahitya:
mOhana rUpam kaNDEn magizhcciyil mUzhgi mUzhgi ezhundEn endai tAyin


anupallavi

  EkAntamAga vaidEhiyuDanE sallApam sheidirukkum sAkEtAdhipan


caraNam    aDimai enakkirangi annai parinduraikka neDiyOn manadilenpAl karuNai migha shurakka
 aDuttu vanda unnai ATkoNDOm enruraikka annavan paNi enrum sheidu nAnirukka
